Title: Relates to the delegation of state enforcement authority to private actors
Summary: Relates to the delegation of state enforcement authority to private actors to bring public enforcement actions of consumer claims.
LawCode: Add Art 22-AA §§350-f-2 - 350-f-5, amd §349, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the delegation of state enforcement authority to private actors
